test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Travelers, Train and Bus ?
test_questions.explanation: Bus and Train are different from each other but some travelers travel by bus and some travel by train.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Profit, Dividend and Bonus ?
test_questions.explanation: Bonus and Dividend are different from each other. But both these are parts of profit.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Women, Mothers and Engineers ?
test_questions.explanation: All mothers are women and some mothers and some women may be engineers.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Factory, Product and Machinery ?
test_questions.explanation: Product and Machinery are different from each other but both are found in Factory.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Author, Lawyer and Singer ?
test_questions.explanation: All the three are different professions.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Judge, Thieves and Criminals ?
test_questions.explanation: All the thieves are criminals while judge is different from these.

test_questions.explanation: Haryana is in India and India is in the World.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Pigeon, Bird and Dog ?
test_questions.explanation: All the pigeons are birds while dog is different from these.

test_questions.explanation: All the three are different from each other.

test_questions.explanation: All the three are different from each other.

test_questions.explanation: Hospital consists of nurse and patient but nurse and patient are of two different nature.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Mercury, Zinc and Metal ?
test_questions.explanation: Mercury and Zinc both are different from one another but belong to metal.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Teacher, Writer and Musician ?
test_questions.explanation: A teacher may or may not be a writer and musician. Similarly a musician may or may not be a teacher and writer and so a writer may or may not be a teacher and musician.

test_questions.question: Which of the following diagrams indicates the best relation between Professors, Doctors and Men ?
test_questions.explanation:
Some doctors may be professors and vice-versa.
Some professors may be men and vice-versa.
Some doctors may be men and vice-versa.
Some doctors may be men and professors as well.
